import React, {useEffect} from 'react' import Card from '../components/Card' const Home = () => { const [page, setPage ]= useState(1) const [blogs, setBlogs] = useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch(`http://localhost:2000/blog/getBlogs?page=${page}`) .then(data=>data.json()) .then(res =>setBlogs(res)) .catch(err=>console.error(err)) }, [page]) return ( <>

Trending

blogs.map(blog=>)

Based on your interests

) } export default Home
